pullRequest.body:
Prove Beck's comonadicity theorem by dualizing everything in [CategoryTheory.Monad.Monadicity](https://leanprover-community.github.io/mathlib4_docs/Mathlib/CategoryTheory/Monad/Monadicity.html).

This contribution was created as part of the AIM workshop "Formalizing Algebraic Geometry" in June 2024.

---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->
- [x] depends on: #14170 
- [x] depends on: #14171 
- [x] depends on: #14236

`+ instance [ReflectsLimitOfIsCosplitPair F] : âˆ€ (A : Coalgebra adj.toComonad),`

`+ instance {A B} (f g : A âŸ¶ B) [IsCoreflexivePair f g] [PreservesLimitOfIsCoreflexivePair F] :`

You should also merge master and make sure everything works with the new variable incusion mechanism. Otherwise LGTM.

```suggestion
/-- The "main pair" for a coalgebra `(A, Î±)` is the pair of morphisms `(G Î±, Î·_GA)`. It is always a
`G`-cosplit pair, and will be used to construct the right adjoint to the comparison functor and show
it is an equivalence.
-/
```

```suggestion
/-- Dual to `Monad.HasCoequalizerOfIsSplitPair`. -/
```

```suggestion
/-- Dual to `Monad.PreservesColimitOfIsSplitPair`. -/
```

```suggestion
/-- Dual to `Monad.ReflectsColimitOfIsSplitPair`. -/
```

```suggestion
/-- Dual to `Monad.CreatesColimitOfIsSplitPair`. -/
```

```suggestion
/-- Dual to `Monad.PreservesColimitOfIsReflexivePair`. -/
```

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(CategoryTheory): Beck's comonadicity theorem
